snippet: Sean Shaynak, a math and science teacher at Brooklyn Technical High School, is accused of sexual abuse, forcible touching, kidnapping and disseminating indecent material, prosecutors said.
abstract: Former New York City teacher Sean Shaynak is arraigned in State Supreme Court in Brooklyn on 36 charges related to incidents occurring from 2011 to 2014 involving six teenage girls; charges include sexual abuse, forcible touching, endangering welfare of child and disseminating indecent material; Shaynak, who taught at Brooklyn Technical High School, faces up to 25 years in prison.

byline.original: By ELIZABETH A. HARRIS and COLIN MOYNIHAN

lead_paragraph: Sean Shaynak, a math and science teacher at Brooklyn Technical High School, is accused of sexual abuse, forcible touching, kidnapping and disseminating indecent material, prosecutors said.

headline.main: Brooklyn Teacher Is Accused of Abusing Girls for 3 Years
headline.print_headline: Brooklyn Teacher Is Accused of Abusing Girls for 3 Years
